Text: This works flawlessly with the new R3113 Beta of PCSX2, running at 1240x1660 with texture filtering. Only bug is that the textures on the dog go from brown to black, so you have a black dog, which isn't really a big deal.

That's probably a PCSX2 issue, because that glitch never happened in-game for me.
Thanks for mentioning it, though!

@xiIix
good for you, but this is actually meant to be burned and played on a real ps2 -.-
